scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix && npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix
scripts.test: npm --prefix backend test && npm --prefix frontend test
scripts.test:coverage: npm --prefix backend run test:coverage && npm --prefix frontend run test:coverage
